Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 一个从单一源接收多播流量的客户端，亦称为源特定多播 (SSM)。

span.span: A client receiver for multicast traffic from a single source, also known as Source Specific Multicast (SSM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须知道的多路广播的组地址和发件人源地址。The multicast group address and sender source address must be known. 除了从特定的发件人，接收多路广播的数据客户端还可以单播数据发送回发件人。In addition to receiving multicast data from a specific sender, the client can also send unicast data back to the sender. 若要从多个源接收多播或源不提前已知时使用类。To receive multicast from multiple sources, or when the sources aren't known in advance, use the class instead.

param.name: sourceAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的发送器源地址。

span.span: The sender source address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: groupAddress
param.span: 此接收器要订阅的多播组地址。

span.span: The multicast group address for this receiver to subscribe to.

param.name: localPort
param.span: 此接收器要绑定到的本地端口。

span.span: The local port for this receiver to bind to.

summary.span: 创建一个可以订阅组地址并从单一源接收数据报的新 UDP 客户端。

span.span: Creates a new UDP client that can subscribe to a group address and receive datagrams from a single source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数相关联的 UDP 多播套接字组地址和端口，但不会将绑定或以其他方式使用套接字。The constructor associates a UDP multicast socket with a group address and port, but does not bind or otherwise use the socket. `groupAddress`参数可以为 IPv6 或 IPv4 多播地址。The `groupAddress` parameter may be either an IPv6 or IPv4 multicast address. 但是的地址族`sourceAddress`和`groupAddress`参数必须相同。However, the address family of the `sourceAddress` and `groupAddress` parameters must the same. `localPort`参数必须指定一个端口小于 1024。The `localPort` parameter must not specify a port less than 1,024.

exception.span: 和 必须为相同地址族。

span.span: and must be the same address family.

-or-

is less than 0

is less than 1024

System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

param.name: callback
param.span: 要在此操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: A callback method to invoke when the operation completes.

param.name: state
param.span: 要传递给此操作的 callback 方法的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information to pass to the callback method for this operation.

summary.span: 绑定套接字并开始多播组的联接操作，以便允许接收来自单个源地址的数据报。

span.span: Binds the socket and begins a join operation to the multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 UDP 多播套接字绑定到本地端口，并加入多播的组以允许从单个源地址接收的数据报。The method binds a UDP multicast socket to a local port and joins a multicast group to allow datagrams to be received from a single source address. 中指定多路广播的组地址、 单个源地址和要绑定到的本地端口构造函数。The multicast group address, single source address, and local port to bind to are specified in the constructor. 中指定的方法`callback`参数调用时要加入多播的组的操作已完成。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when the operation to join the multicast group has completed. 如果所需的运行时，方法还执行策略检查，以验证客户端是否可以访问多路广播的组。If required by the runtime, the method also performs a policy check to verify that the client is allowed to access the multicast group. 如果客户端不允许访问，将引发。If the client is not allowed access, a is thrown with .

exception.span: 已经联接多播组，或联接操作正在进行。

span.span: The multicast group has already been joined or a join operation is currently in progress.
The has been disposed.

exception.span: 尝试访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred when attempting to access the socket.

summary.span: 开始执行从已联接的多播组接收数据包的操作，并在来自指定发送器的数据包到达组时调用指定的回叫。

span.span: Begins the operation of receiving a packet from the joined multicast group and invokes the specified callback when a packet has arrived on the group from a specified sender.
Returns .
An that references this operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始从来自单个发件人已联接的多播组接收 UDP 数据包的操作。The method begins an operation of receiving a UDP packet from the joined multicast group from a single sender. 中指定的本地端口、 多路广播的组和发件人源地址构造函数。The local port, multicast group, and sender source address are specified in the constructor. 多播客户端必须具有已完成到多路广播组的联接。The multicast client must also have completed a join to the multicast group. 中指定的方法`callback`已接收数据包时要调用参数。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has received. 很可能将出现套接字故障，如果接收操作失败以同步方式，尽管这并不常见使用 UDP。It is possible to have a socket failure if a receive operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果套接字失败，则引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始将 UDP 数据包发送到以前指定的源的操作。The method begins an operation of sending a UDP packet to the source previously specified. 某些协议使用此信息来传递流控制，质量的服务统计信息或恢复消息。Some protocols use this information to pass along flow control, quality of service statistics, or recovery messages. 中指定的方法`callback`参数调用时发送一个数据包。The method specified in the `callback` parameter is invoked when a packet has been sent. 客户端必须已完成到多路广播组的联接。The client must have completed a join to the multicast group. 如果在指定目标端口`remotePort`参数是小于 1024引发与。If the destination port specified in the `remotePort` parameter is less than 1,024, a is thrown with . 就可以具有套接字失败，如果发送操作失败以同步方式，虽然这是与 UDP 不常见。It is possible to have a socket failure if a send operation fails synchronously, although this is uncommon with UDP. 如果套接字失败，则引发。If a socket failure occurs, a is thrown. 收到的错误指定的成员为枚举。The error received is specified as a member of the enumeration.

summary.span: 离开多播组并释放 类和基础 的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Leaves the multicast group and releases all resources used by the current instance of the class and the underlying the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 获取或设置 的接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播接收操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the used for multicast receive operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 接收缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the receive buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReceiveBufferSize`属性获取或设置大小，以字节为单位的接收缓冲区的基础用于对此的多播的接收操作实例。The `ReceiveBufferSize` property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the receive buffer of the underlying used for multicast receive operations on this instance. 具体而言，`ReceiveBufferSize`属性控制当数据包到达时，但尚未调用应用程序时使用堆栈的缓冲区的大小方法。Specifically, the `ReceiveBufferSize` property controls the size of the buffer used by the stack when a packet arrives, but the application has not yet called the method. 如果此缓冲区被填满，并且在应用程序调用之前不断传入数据包和方法，旧的数据包将被丢弃。If this buffer gets filled up and packets keep coming before the application calls the and methods, old packets will get dropped. 应用程序永远无法接收旧的数据包，并改为调用时才接收较新的数据包方法。The application will never be able to receive the old packets, and will instead receive newer packets when it calls the method. Windows 上的接收缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。The default size of the receive buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable
System.Obsolete("This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.", true)

summary.span: 获取或设置 的发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位），该缓冲区用于此 实例上的多播发送操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the used for multicast send operations on this instance.
Returns .

value.span: 发送缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the send buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SendBufferSize 属性获取或设置的大小，以字节为单位的发送缓冲区的基础用于对此的多播的发送操作实例。The SendBufferSize property gets or sets the size, in bytes, of the send buffer of the underlying used for multicast send operations on this instance. Mac OS X 上属性控制字节数可以是网络堆栈的额外调用前，发送等待缓冲区中方法开始失败。On Mac OS X, the property controls how many bytes can be in the network stack's waiting-to-be-sent buffer before additional calls to the method start failing. Mac OS X 上的应用程序可能需要加以注意此属性，如果它们将在短时间范围内发送大量的 UDP 数据包。Applications on Mac OS X may need to be concerned with this property if they are sending a large number of UDP packets in a short timeframe. 在 Windows 中上, 调用方法将采用较长的时间调用的回调，具体取决于值属性如果发送缓冲区已满。On Windows, calls to the method will take longer to call the callback depending on the value of the property if the send buffer is full. 属性仅控制是否在用户的缓冲区保持在物理内存中锁定，直到在发送完成。The property only controls whether the user's buffer stays locked in physical memory until the send completes. Windows 上的发送缓冲区的默认大小为 8192。The default size of the send buffer on Windows is 8,192.

exception.span: 指定的缓冲区大小小于 0。

span.span: The buffer size specified is less than 0.
The multicast group has not yet been joined.
The has been disposed.
